org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search
Interface Constants

All Known Implementing Classes:
RangeQueryNode, RelationQueryNode
public interface Constants

This interface defines constants for data types and operation types used in queries.

Version:
$Revision: $, $Date: $

          less than operation: <

          not equal operation: <>
